original_title: Albert Heijn - Op de Winkel Passen
overview: Albert Heijn exists 125 years. The supermarket chain is an unmistakable part of Dutch cultural heritage. AH is for many a synonym for the supermarket in the Netherlands. And let's be honest: AH has actually contributed to the changes in our way of buying, our diet, our taste. This diptych sheds light on the history of AH, and thus actually a piece of the history of the Netherlands. Albert Heijn anticipated the changing society with its range. We used to only eat potatoes, vegetables and meat, nowadays the choice is enormous.
title: Albert Heijn - Minding the Store
